      name - Item name
      price - Item price
      imageUrl - Item image URL
      count - Item count
      category - Item category
      maxInStock - Maximum number of stock left for the item
      inPayment - Indication of whether the client is in payment, false by default
      date - Date
      Returns:
      Item table row (tr) element of a table
